summary: ENGINE COMES UP TO TEMPERATURE HEATER WORKS NORMAL HEAT GOES OUT. ENGINE TEMP RISIES QUICKLY TO OVERHEAT CONDITION. THIS CONDITION CONTINUES TO REPEAT ITSELF.
